variable.tooltip: Frequency is dependant on the difference between selected speed step and the actual speed

Turbocompressore in funzione della accellerazione
Turbolader: Frequenz zu Beschleunigen/Bremsen
Závislost otáček turbodmychadla na zrychlení

variable.tooltip: Threshold of audible sound of the turbocharger, the load is determined by CV367 and 368
variable.label: Minimum load on the Turbocharger
Carico Min. Turbocompressore
Turbolader: Hörschwelle
Minimální zatížení pro slyšitelnost turbodmychadla

variable.item: Increase in frequency of the Turbocharger

Incremento frequenza Turbocompressore
Turbolader: Steigung der Frequenz erhöhen
Nárůst frekvence turbodmychadla

variable.item: Decrease in frequency of the Turbocharger

Decremento frequenza Turbocompressore
Turbolader: Steigung der Frequenz absenken
